original_title: ※胸糞NTR 最悪の鬱勃起映像 幸せを約束した大好きな彼女がおっさんに寝取られて、壊されました。 涼森れむ
overview: Remu is a college student who has a boyfriend named Hayato. She also works part-time at a convenience store, however, one day she gets caught shoplifting some small stuff in the store by her despicable coworker Kubota. Who wants compensation… to keep his mouth shut…
title: My Favorite Girlfriend Who Promised Happiness Was Taken Down by an Old Man and Destroyed. Remu Suzumori
